page.title: 09Ampleforth Work and Play.
page.content: { Work}- About 700 people live in Ampleforth village. The employment rate is quite good for the area. There are a large number of self employed craftsmen such as plumbers, builders, shopkeepers or publicans. Others work in Helmsley or Kirkbymoorside or commute to York or Middlesborough, and some work locally as farm labourers. Ampleforth Abbey employs about 135 people from the village as teachers, builders, clerical or domestic staff, gardeners or farm workers. { Play}- Ampleforth has football and bowls teams. The villagers also use the St.Albans Centre at Ampleforth College. The Village Hall holds classes and a Historical Society. The church holds social events like fetes and bazaars. There are Brownies, Guides, and Toddler and Youth groups.
